NKDA. pt is a 75 yo white male retired. denies any alcohol use Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 162 cm, Weight 59.7 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Deep Venous Thrombosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed warfarin - 5 mg daily, and ordered Duplex US of leg.

td.content: s:a 75 yr old white M presents with mild gradual onset of blurred vision. o:Height 162 cm, Weight 60 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered non-dilated fundus examination.

s:a white male retired aged 76 yrs presents with moderate swelling and mild numbness of the left arm, moderate denial of any past history of surgery and intravenous drug use and moderate pain and swelling in left shoulder for 3 weeks. he has a history of Deep Venous Thrombosis for past 3 years. he denies drinking alcohol Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 163 cm, Weight 61.2 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Deep Venous Thrombosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed fondaparinux - 10 mg daily, and ordered Doppler US of leg.
